title: Reconnect to an unexisting game?
body: I loged into league and it told me to reconnect because a game was in progress which got me hella confused because my last game was 2 hours ago from that time and i finished it. SO i tried to reconnect but it couldnt and said it crashed. I cant do anything right now. I cant start a new game.

replies.body: It looks like you experienced a ghost game issue, which can be forced to refresh after a relog or waiting a bit.  It can happen if the match fails to communicate that it ended with our server.  Everything looks fine now!
same here ....and i don t know what to do ...

This is happening to me to, right at this moment. I've waited for soon 3 hours now :(

Hope they reply soon
